extends Movable

An interface for Ghost object~~ Extends Moveable

Method Summary
 double distanceToPac(Pac pac)
          Calculate the euclidian distance (the norm) from the center of this ghost to the center of Pacman, in pixels.
 int framesTillRecover()
          Returns the number of frames till the ghost recovering from Frightened state.
 GhostName getName()
          Get the name of the ghost.
 GhostState getState()
          Get the current state of the ghost.

framesTillRecover

int framesTillRecover()
Returns the number of frames till the ghost recovering from Frightened state. If the current state of the ghost is not frightened, the method will return 0.

Returns:
Integer

distanceToPac

double distanceToPac(Pac pac)
Calculate the euclidian distance (the norm) from the center of this ghost to the center of Pacman, in pixels.

Returns:
Double
